items.title: Brand new Qi2.2 Turbo 25W 3-in-1 Charging Station with metal build launches at $72 (Reg. $100)
items.summary:
The new Qi2.2 25W MagSafe stands are starting to come out of the woodwork now, and one of the models that might be flying under your radar is now at a new Amazon all-time low. The official KU XIU Amazon storefront is now offering its new X40 Turbo 3-in-1 Qi2.2 25W Magnetic Wireless Charger down at $71.99 shipped after you clip the on-page coupon. This one launched on Amazon earlier today at $100 and is now seeing a notable launch deal for the lowest price we have tracked.

items.summary:
Wall Street Journal:
Some 20-somethings flocking to SF to build trillion-dollar AI startups say no to booze, sleep, and fun as they strive to be, or appear to be, the most obsessed  —  To reach the dream of creating a trillion-dollar company, the 20-somethings flocking to San Francisco give up everything but their laptops

items.title: As Harry visits Ukraine, combat amputees use sport to aid rehabilitation
items.summary: KHARKIV, Ukraine (Reuters) -As Britain's Prince Harry visited Kyiv to support wounded veterans on Friday, dozens of military amputees gathered in Ukraine's second city, Kharkiv, to take part in a sports competition designed to support soldiers who have lost limbs. Read full story

items.summary: The application to host a Side Event at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 closes tonight at 11:59 p.m. PT. Boost your brand during Disrupt Week in October. Apply now.

items.title: India, EU trade talks enter crucial phase, aiming to seal deal by year end
items.summary: NEW DELHI (Reuters) -Trade talks between India and the European Union have entered a crucial phase and negotiators are working intensively to meet a year-end deadline for signing the free trade pact, a top European Union Official said on Tuesday. Read full story

items.summary: Thabo Bester had argued the documentary would affect his trial for allegedly faking his death to escape prison.

items.title: Get up to $2,300 in early-bird savings on Jackery’s new HomePower 3600 Plus LiFePO4 power station starting from $1,699
items.summary:
Jackery has just launched its early-bird member-only discounts (free to sign up) on its new HomePower 3600 Plus Portable Power Station starting from $1,699 shipped that will run through September 21, along with some bundle options, as well (more on those below the fold). This new unit follows right behind the recent launch of the HomePower 3000 station, carrying a slightly higher full price of $2,799, and also coming in $100 higher at Amazon. This is the first chance at savings ahead of the new backup solution officially releasing, with it getting $1,100 here that sets the bar for future discounts down the road. Head below to learn more about its capabilities and check out the early-bird bundle discounts too.

items.title: New limited edition Astro Bot Joyful DualSense now available for purchase
items.summary:
Update 9/12: The new ASTRO BOT Joyful Limited Edition DualSense controller is now available for purchase at Walmart and Target, among others.

  • Walmart ASTRO BOT Joyful Limited Edition
  • Target ASTRO BOT Joyful Limited Edition

Update 9/12: Pre-orders for the new Astro Bot Joyful edition DualSense will go live this morning at 7 a.m. PT/10 a.m. PT directly from Sony, and we are expecting to see “participating” retailers with units as well. You’ll want to be ready ahead of the official start time if you’re going with direct.playstation.com – the virtual queue tends to open ahead of time.

Back in June Sony officially revealed a new edition of its beloved and equally as adorable Astro Bot DualSense controller. We got our first look at the new controller a few months back, but Sony has announced when you’ll actually be able to get your hands on one.

Tomorrow is the 40th anniversary for Super Mario Bros. and Nintendo is ready to celebrate. During today’s Direct presentation it debuted a ton of exciting updates and new releases for Mario’s 40th, including a new teaser trailer and confirmation of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie. However, on top of that we are also getting a new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 bundle release as well as two new companion amiibo figures too.

items.title: Nepal's former chief justice Sushila Karki chosen interim leader, president's office says
items.summary: KATHMANDU (Reuters) -Nepal's former Chief Justice Sushila Karki has been chosen as the country's interim leader, said an official from Nepal president's office, after violent anti-corruption protests forced Prime Minister K.P. Sharma Oli to resign this week. Read full story

During today’s lengthy Nintendo Direct, we did not get any updates on the Switch Online GameCube library, but Nintendo did officially announce Virtual Boy! It is ready to add an entirely new console to its Nintendo Classics collection in the form of the ultra-retro Virtual Boy library alongside an actual Virtual Boy peripheral you stick your Switch or Switch 2 inside of. items.summary:
Amazon is offering a new low price on an already budget-friendly EV bundle, with the Hoverfly H3 16-inch Folding e-bike coming with four add-on accessories at $399.99 shipped in its white colorway while the other colorways are sitting at higher rates. This package has been going for $580 at full price these days, which we saw drop lowest to $406 back in late July, but that rate is now getting out here today. You’re looking at a 31% markdown that cuts $180 off the tag for the best new price we have tracked – and don’t forget you’ll be getting a rear cargo basket, front carrier bag, a phone holder, and a rearview mirror too.

items.title: Anker’s SOLIX Fan Fest weekend flash sale drops new F3000 power station back to $1,599 Prime Day low (Reg. $2,599), more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing SOLIX Fan Fest Sale running through September 21, Anker has launched a weekend flash sale that is bringing the costs down on four different units. Among them, we spotted Anker’s new SOLIX F3000 Portable Power Station with a FREE 120V generator input adapter dropping down to $1,599 shipped, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $51, and sadly, the extra 5% savings code isn’t valid for these deals. It was already brought down from its $2,599 full price to $1,649 in the sale, with the flash savings here returning it to this rate for the first time since it appeared during July’s Prime Day event. You’re looking at the second-ever chance to pick it up at the best price we have tracked – plus, you’re getting the free adapter cable that is valued at $99 normally, which only sweetens the pot. Head below to see the full lineup of flash deals while they last.

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the best price yet on the LEGO Technic BMW M 1000 RR Motorcycle for $198 shipped. This model usually fetches $250 at full price, which is what you can expect to pay picking it up directly from LEGO, where discounts are very rare occurrences. Discounts at Amazon are equally rare finds, and the last time we saw one was 2023 when the kit had $10 cut from the tag. Today’s deal is coming in bigger-than-ever, with $52 off the going rate for the best price we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it and the other LEGO Technic sets seeing discounts right now.

items.title: Apple’s most affordable 32GB M4 MacBook Pro is $300 off today
items.summary:
B&H has landed with some special price drops on Apple’s latest M4 and M4 Pro MacBook Pro models as of late. We are still tracking a sizable $400 price drop on this 16-inch M4 Pro MacBook Pro with 48GB of RAM, but this morning we are taking a looking at another notable deal for the authorized retailer on a more affordable 14-inch model. You won’t find any M4 MacBook Pro configs with 32GB of RAM over at Amazon, but B&H is now offering the most affordable one at $300 off the list price.
